Export.CSP:
<csp:content charset="utf-8"> <script language="cache" runat="server">
//执行动作 s action = $Get(%request.Data("action",1))
// //保存医疗报告 i action = "saveMedReport" d .;s adrRepID= $Get(%request.Data("adrRepID",1)) .;s adrRepDataList= $Get(%request.Data("adrRepDataList",1)) .;s adrRepAuditList= $Get(%request.Data("adrRepAuditList",1)) .;s retvalue=##class(web.DHCADVMEDREPORT).SaveMedReport(adrRepID,adrRepDataList,adrRepAuditList) .;s retinfo="" .;s ret="retvalue"_"^"_retvalue_$c(2)_"retinfo"_retinfo .;w ##Class(web.DHCADVJSONCOMMON).JsonText(ret)
//获取医疗报表信息 i action = "GetMedRepInfo" d .;s adrRepID= $Get(%request.Data("adrRepID",1)) .;s data=##class(web.DHCADVMEDREPORT).GetMedRepInfo(adrRepID) .;s data=##class(web.DHCADVJSONCOMMON).JsonCell("data",data) .;w "{"_data_"}"
//重点标记 i action = "MedImpReport" d .S adrRepID=$Get(%request.Data("ID",1)) .S adrRepImpFlag=$Get(%request.Data("RepImpFlag",1)) .w ##class(web.DHCADVMEDADRREPORT).InsImpReport(adrRepID,adrRepImpFlag)
//获取页面默认信息 i action = "getMedInfo" d .S params=$Get(%request.Data("params",1)) .w ##class(web.DHCADVMEDADRREPORT).getMedInfo(params)
//删除-医疗不良反应报告 i action = "DelMedReport" d .s params=$Get(%request.Data("params",1)) .w ##class(web.DHCADVMEDADRREPORT).DelMedReport(params)
//保存医疗报告 i action = "saveMedReport" d .s adrRepID= $Get(%request.Data("adrRepID",1)) .s adrRepDataList= $Get(%request.Data("adrRepDataList",1)) .s adrRepAuditList= $Get(%request.Data("adrRepAuditList",1)) .s flag= $Get(%request.Data("flag",1)) .s ret=##class(web.DHCADVMEDADRREPORT).SaveMedReport(adrRepID,adrRepDataList,adrRepAuditList,flag) .w ret
//医疗不良事件,报告类别 lp i action="GetEventLev" d .d ##class(web.DHCADVMEDADRREPORT).GetEventLev()
//医疗不良事件，关联轻重程度联动 lp i action="GetInjuryLevByType" d .s eventID=$Get(%request.Data("eventID",1)) .d ##class(web.DHCADVMEDADRREPORT).GetInjuryLevByType(eventID)
//获取医疗报表信息 i action = "GetMedRepInfo" d .s adrRepID= $Get(%request.Data("adrRepID",1)) .S params=$Get(%request.Data("params",1)) .s ret=##class(web.DHCADVMEDADRREPORT).GetMedRepInfo(adrRepID,params) .w ret
//获取病人基本信息 i action = "GetPatBaseInfo" d .s PatNo= $Get(%request.Data("PatNo",1)) .s EpisodeID= $Get(%request.Data("EpisodeID",1)) .s data=##class(web.DHCADVMEDCOMMON).GetPatBaseInfo(PatNo, EpisodeID) .s data=##class(web.DHCADVJSONCOMMON).JsonCell("data",data) .w "{"_data_"}"
//查询不良事件类别 2016-09-29 congyue i action = "GetAdrRepTypeByID" d .s rows="100" //$Get(%request.Data("rows",1)) .s page="1" //$Get(%request.Data("page",1)) .s adrRepID=$Get(%request.Data("adrRepID",1)) .s evtType=$Get(%request.Data("evtType",1)) .w ##class(web.DHCADVMEDREPORT).GetAdrRepTypeByID(rows,page,adrRepID,evtType)
//查询不良事件类别 i action = "QueryAdvTypeInfoList" d .s rows=$Get(%request.Data("rows",1)) .s page=$Get(%request.Data("page",1)) .w ##class(web.DHCADVMEDCOMMON).QueryAdvTypeInfoList(rows,page)
//加载部门 i action = "QueryCtCptList" d .s rows=$Get(%request.Data("rows",1)) .s page=$Get(%request.Data("page",1)) .w ##class(web.DHCADVMEDCOMMON).QueryDocLocList(rows,page)
//保存不良事件名称 i action = "SaveAdrEvent" d .s params=$Get(%request.Data("params",1)) .w ##class(web.DHCADVMEDEVENTADD).SaveMedAdrEvent(params)
//删除不良事件名称 i action = "DelAdrEvent" d .s params=$Get(%request.Data("params",1)) .w ##class(web.DHCADVMEDEVENTADD).DelAdrEvent(params)
///不良反应/事件名称查询 i action = "QueryAdrEvent" d .s rows=$Get(%request.Data("rows",1)) .s page=$Get(%request.Data("page",1)) .s params=$Get(%request.Data("params",1)) .w ##class(web.DHCADVMEDEVENTADD).QueryAdrEvent(rows,page,params)
//不良反应/事件名称 i action = "QueryAdrEventCombo" d .d ##class(web.DHCADVMEDEVENTADD).QueryAdrEventCombo() //============================不良事件权限查看=====================================
///查询-权限查看按类别 i action = "GetQuerySec" d .s params=$Get(%request.Data("params",1)) .w ##class(web.DHCADVMEDEVENTADD).GetQuerySec(params)
//保存-权限查看按类别 i action = "SaveQuerySec" d .s params=$Get(%request.Data("params",1)) .W ##class(web.DHCADVMEDEVENTADD).SaveQuerySec(params)
//删除-权限查看按类别 i action = "DelQuerySec" d .s params=$Get(%request.Data("params",1)) .w ##class(web.DHCADVMEDEVENTADD).DelQuerySec(params) //============================公共查询方法===================================== //获取病人登记号 i action = "getPatNo" d .S patID=$Get(%request.Data("patID",1)) .w ##class(web.DHCADVCOMMON).getPatNo(patID)
//病人基本信息 i action = "getRepPatInfo" d .S PatNo=$Get(%request.Data("PatNo",1)) .S EpisodeID=$Get(%request.Data("EpisodeID",1)) .w ##class(web.DHCADVCOMMON).getRepPatInfo(PatNo,EpisodeID)
//获取病人就诊列表 i action = "GetAdmDs" d .s rows=$Get(%request.Data("rows",1)) .s page=$Get(%request.Data("page",1)) .s Input=$Get(%request.Data("Input",1)) .;s Input="0000000001" .w ##class(web.DHCADVCOMMON).GetAdmDs(rows,page,Input)
//性别信息 i action = "SelSex" d .d ##class(web.DHCADVCOMMON).SelSex()
//============================医疗器械不良反应报告表=====================================
//重点标记 i action = "MaterImpReport" d .S matadrID=$Get(%request.Data("ID",1)) .S matadrRepImpFlag=$Get(%request.Data("RepImpFlag",1)) .;S TMP("YYT")=matadrID_"^"_matadrRepImpFlag .w ##class(web.DHCADVMEDREPORT).InsImpReport(matadrID,matadrRepImpFlag)

///保存-医疗器械不良反应报告 i action = "saveMataReport" d .s matadrID=$Get(%request.Data("matadrID",1)) .s matadrDataList=$Get(%request.Data("matadrDataList",1)) .S matadrRepAuditList=$Get(%request.Data("matadrRepAuditList",1)) .S flag=$Get(%request.Data("flag",1)) .S ret=##class(web.DHCADVMEDREPORT).saveMataReport(matadrID,matadrDataList,matadrRepAuditList,flag) .W ret //删除-医疗器械不良反应报告 i action = "DelMataReport" d .s params=$Get(%request.Data("params",1)) .w ##class(web.DHCADVMEDREPORT).DelMataReport(params)

//类别 i action = "selType" d .d ##class(web.DHCADVMEDREPORT).SelType()
//工作流项目类型 i action = "SelEvtWFItm" d .d ##class(web.DHCADVMEDREPORT).SelEvtWFItm()
